titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for payment in all cases of lump-sum death payments.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 11/9/1999--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to require lump-sum death payments to be made in the manner provided with respect to payment of underpayments to survivors or heirs when the eligible person is deceased.
